snippet.title: Narrow Woods Hotel Trailer | GameMaker Horror Game
snippet.description:
The trailer for my first ever, fully released video game.
A retro point-and-click horror adventure game that tests the boundries of the genre.
Navigate the mysterious Narrow Woods Hotel, find keys, solve puzzles and fight your way through this hostile place. Try to make it out alive.

Check the game out for FREE on itch io:
https://hyperfreezegames.itch.io/narrow-woods-hotel

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Maker Studio 2:
https://gamemaker.io/en/gamemaker

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Itch io:
https://hyperfreezegames.itch.io/

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/hyper_freeze

Instagram:
@hyperfreezegames


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#gamedev #indiedev #gamemaker #gamemakerstudio2 #trailer #gaming #videogames #horrorgaming #horror
